review: though maybe not as prominent as vanrippers later games like helltaker ronin is a solid and fun platforming stealth action game with excellent tone soundtrack and simple fun the game is certainly challenging  especially on ng  but the generous checkpoints and increasing power make it always survivable a solid choice for someone looking for a fun few hours with great aesthetics and feel
enemies with a rifle are kinda overpowerful lets add some more of them and make them spread shooting lol  its all you should know adout new game plus

this game is great i finished it a few times and i have to addmit it is a bit repetetive but i liked it either way on the new game plus it got really challenging so if you like puzzle games and youre a fan of gunpoint i can surely recommend it i think arround 12h is the max you can play out of it

hmm this one is hard if you like puzzles and turnbased actions combined together this game is pretty good but if youre playing this game and expecting a stealth focused game play dont bother overall okay game
good challenging side scroller of sorts
the game hints mention that this isnt gunpoint and they aint kidding
not especially difficult or long but a very fun romp worth the time to play through fully
made me rage quite a bit but its def doable not sure if id recommend for full price tho
its cool

its a great game with its own level of understanding how the game works i had to really think sometimes on how i had to plan my moves in order to complete this game this is a game perfect for a simple concept but with a challenge
fun little platformer i got all achievements on this game can get frustrating but overall good little game
fun game i loved it
if youre looking for a game to enjoy for a few hours then move on and you dont mind having to occasionally retry a single part of a level a dozen times then this is a good choice
fun little turn based action platformer thing the mechanics can be a bit jank sometimes but its enjoyably frustrating

a tight stealth puzzler made by a small team ive played through multiple times and at this point really enjoy optimising the murder spree for our ronin  beating new game plus is a cathartic release and she deserves vengeance
good
decent game  but there is an random factor to it that sometimes means you die reload and do the exact same thing but with another outcome
great game
a very nifty strategy platformer with turnbased combat similar to gunpoint an old classic  you hop swing kill getting extra skills and new enemies as you go on sale for 259 thats a steal right there
just a good game im happy i played it its not perfect but i still like it patryk karwat did a nice job with a soundtrack also i recommend turning vsync off it causes odd lag spikes for some reason
simple pleasant good modeled on a similar older game passing the hardest level is a challenge
yeah its pretty good goes on sale for pretty cheap too

one of the best indie games ive played i sort of wish there was a dlc for more weapons and more levels to continue the story its simple and i enjoyed it a lot for how much it cost it feels really intense even when there is an option to pause you have to do the timing correct and there are so many things to think about if you enjoy short puzzle games then this one is for you ive played it over a few times already
fun gameplay lite but good story
extremely fun game
very good
enjoyed it a lot makes you feel like a badass even if you already are
randomly freezes while playing a good game which is a shame
really amazing indie game
i highly recommand this game it can be difficult from time to time on new game plus but not too much

a charming game but definitely rough around the edges not as satisfying as id expect from a game about slicing and dicing the fun abilities are locked behind a combo meter if you break it by not attacking an enemy you cant use your abilities weird mechanic not a fan  funnily enough its capped at 30 fps when played natively on the steam deck run it with the latest version of proton to get 60 frames  710

clunky movement aside ronin is a great stealthaction platformer with tense turnbased combat also a surprisingly high skill ceiling when it comes to stealth i regularly come back to it just to replay a level or two

terrific game the flow of battle with timing when you do everything right or as close to right with violence or stealth is very satisfying  the complaints about it being a ripoff of gunpoint are off target theres similarity but it doesnt feel as zippy as gunpoint
ive payed this game 255 but lost the cost of my keyboard still worth it

it could be better lukasz piskorz aka vanripper had good ideas and animations of homebriefing menu which werent included to release version  and yet music and sound design are rich gameplay is topgrade and full of tricks also some movielike situations give neat experience i just would like to feel a better bond between player and protagonist but i assume it cannot be fixed anymore  anyway game is good rrreally

for a final level its very frustrating to finish when theres no checkpoints and the ending itself is very unsatisfying and on new game plus for some reason the machine gunners are now able to change their aim during their turn which means that when you are close to the fireline of the gunners they can direct it to you during their turn cant plan around that since its not communicated so you just have to guess

frustrating sometimes but i enjoy

loved the action on this one played nonstop all the way to the end

while it gets annoying sometimes especially with how the movement and turn based combat cooperate the game ultimately boils down to an enjoyable experience with fun physics and awesome gameplay which makes you feel like a badass
a really good combination of platformer and turn base strategy even with the imprecision of the jump arc still lots of fun to finnish
fun and challenging game done all the achievements in under 10 hours but worth a buy
not sure where the negativity is coming from i loved this game
pretty simple but also pretty great dont have a bunch of bells a whistles but its still pretty entertaining  i end up replaying it every once in a while

i always saw this game on steam and always saw it advertised as a stealth game this isnt a stealth game its a turnbased combat game with very little stealth elements the level design is also much closer to doom and quake forcing you rooms where you must keep moving at all times and manage your enemies as you traverse the arena i like this game a lot and its fun to dispatch a room like a badass genius but its not a stealth game it is a difficult one though
finished 2x times great short game
i think this game is very fun but there needs to be a dedicated walkthroughguide for it cause it can be very difficult i even beat cuphead and i thought this game was impossible at times
short but unique and difficult game a combination of stealth and turnbased action a bit glitchy to the extent that the player has to manually maneuver around the glitches but nothing gamebreaking

a solid stealthcombat platformer similar to gunpoint which has a great overall vibe  art and music are solid and draw you in the story is simple but welltold for what it is and the gameplay has just enough variation to keep you learning throughout the whole playthrough

neat little stealth game with some pretty cool music its pretty simple and short there isnt much narrative or depth to the gameplay but it doesnt overstay its welcome and definitely fun for a rainy afternoon i recommend this as a real fun treat inbetween especially if you can get it on sale
fun game can be frustrating with some of the jumps not being exactly what youd imagine them being but overall something thats always nice to come back to

the turn based combat required some strategic thinking now and then which made it challenging enough that i didnt get bored but also didnt have to put in huge amounts of time to finish which is good when you dont have time for the big games all in all fun was had good stuff

short but fun
fun gameplay and cool atmosphere

had it been a stealth game thered been some potential to it but as the game itself says this is not a stealth game just kill everyone so youre forced into a turnbased action game with lacklustre controls bad instructions and just no fun save your money and time for something else

graphics  gameplay  music  sounds  controller support  poor menu ui  story  controller cant do as much as keyboard  can be unfairly hard  note this is closer to a puzzle game than an action platformer  the game is somewhat short but hard expect to have to grind some levels and eventually look up a video
unique and interesting concept executed pretty well wish there were more games like this to take the formula further

so far i have beaten the second boss and this game is quite a lot of fun in my head right now it feels like a mix between gunpoint and mark of the ninja now the jump mechanic can be frustrating and the whole game has a layer of jank but its still loads of fun and really satisfying to finish a room or group of enemies youve been struggling with

a challenging turnbased action game that at times feels more like a puzzle game with the amount of planning you need to do during encounters if you are a fan of hotline miami i would recommend this to you
ronin is a wonderful but imperfect game it feels like a turn based mark of the ninja if that sounds fun then imo its all you need to know if not then maybe it isnt for you
